column1: '''''Tolkien - The Centenary Calendar 1992''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Grafton]] on [[25 July]] [[1991]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
* Cover - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Anger of the Mountain.jpg
* January - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - An Unexpected Morning Visit.jpg
* May - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - At the Court of the Fountain.jpg
column2: At the Court of the Fountain]]"

column1: * June - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Éowyn and the Lord of the Nazgûl.jpg
column2: Éowyn and the Lord of the Nazgûl]]"

column1: * July - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Anger of the Mountain.jpg
* August - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Morgoth and the High King of Noldor (1992).jpg
column2: Morgoth and the High King of the Noldor]]"

column1: * September - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Last Words of Boromir.jpg
* October - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Glittering Caves of Aglarond.jpg
* December - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Shores of Valinor.jpg
